ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful to M. E. Lee, Clinical Research Coordinator, for her sincere assistance in administrative support, data collection, and management. This research was supported by the Korean Healthcare Technology R&D Project, Ministry for Health, Welfare and Family Affairs, Republic of Korea (HI14C1596, HR14C0008) and by grants for the 20 by 20 Project from Samsung Medical Center (Best number 3, GFO2170091).
